title: Un/PW error - changed pw twice (logging in to client)
body:
First I was getting a "cant connect to server check the connection HERE and then reset your pw"

I reset the PW.
Now i'm getting 'wrong pw' noticed on log in.

replies.body: Now I get one of two errors: either 'unable to connect to authentication service' or 'username/ password combination is wrong' (which it is not)--tried resetting password but also can't get the password reset emails

That password reset may not have been able to go through successfully if it happened during the login issues that we've recently been having. Hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to make sure that password gets reset correctly.

Now I'm getting unable to authenticate again.
Servers just down?

For me 'server status' shows all good and all green--but I guess that is just bull****
---did you try re-installing? I am kind of hesitant
